rows.label: qst202401_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo mo?! Y-You there, you're
with a Tirkin, mo?!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0002
rows.name:
How dare you show your face
before this Noganga, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0004
rows.name:
Playing dumb is useless, mo! I
will never forgive you, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0005
rows.name:
What's this? Are you mistaking
Ibuki for a Tirkin?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0006
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Am I wrong, mo?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh, come on. Ibuki's not a
Tirkin, you know? She's a Blade!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0008
rows.name:
What? Then you should
have said so sooner, mo.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0009
rows.name:
You look so similar, anyone
would mistake you, mo. It's
beyond just confusing, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, you're the one who said it
before I could correct you...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202401_msg0011
rows.name: Why are you so hostile towards Tirkin?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0012
rows.name: Glad you asked, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0013
rows.name:
It happened when I was
returning to Avaritia from
a business deal in Gula, mo.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0014
rows.name:
The Divine Beast ship was attacked
by Tirkin, and they stole my precious
Nopon Trade Guild ID, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0015
rows.name:
Now I have to go through tedious
procedures to do business, mo. With
the ID, it would be over in an instant...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202401_msg0016
rows.name: They take anything that shines, mo.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0017
rows.name:
And on top of that, they're
bird-brained, so they immediately
forget where they hid it, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0018
rows.name:
It's all the Tirkin's fault that
my business isn't going well, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0019
rows.name:
So when someone who looks just
like a Tirkin shows up, of
course I'd get angry, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0020
rows.name: That's just taking it out on her...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202401_msg0036
rows.name: Hey, hey, Nora, did you know?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0037
rows.name:
They're having a half-price sale
on fish paste at Fishy Fishy.
Let's go buy some together!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0038
rows.name:
A good deal is a good thing, mo!
Leave the heavy lifting to Hana, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0039
rows.name: Ibuki! Are you listening?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0040
rows.name: Um...[ML:Dash ] what was it again?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0041
rows.name:
We were talking about how
Ibuki looks like a Tirkin.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0021
rows.name:
I remember now! I don't know
why you're complaining to me.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0022
rows.name:
What part of me looks like a
Tirkin? We're not alike at all!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0023
rows.name:
Yes you are, mo! No matter how you
look at it, you're a Tirkin, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0024
rows.name: I bet your brains are the same, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0025
rows.name: That's not true!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0026
rows.name:
Ho ho. Then, can you prove
you're different, mo?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0027
rows.name:
Fine! I'll go get your Nopon
Trade Guild ID back for you.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0028
rows.name:
That way, it'll prove I'm
smarter than a Tirkin, right?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0029
rows.name:
Ibuki...[ML:Dash ] You completely fell
for his provocation...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202401_msg0030
rows.name:
It's f-fine, it's fine!
Nothing to worry about!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0031
rows.name:
So, where was this... thingy
ID stolen from again?

rows.label: qst202401_msg0032
rows.name:
We were attacked when we
were passing near the
Liberalitas Archipelago, mo.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0033
rows.name:
So their hideout must be
somewhere around there, mo.

rows.label: qst202401_msg0034
rows.name:
If you can get it back, I'll admit
you're different from a Tirkin, mo!

rows.label: qst202401_msg0035
rows.name: Okay! Then, let's go!
